title: website: associate specific color with examples and runnable code
body:
Perhaps examples should have a color, and that color should be used everywhere examples
are found. That way users will associated that color with example code, and more easily
notice that the examples are there. The light yellow background of the playground could
be that color.

Then the decl list in the index could be annotated with a little icon or a short word in
that color to indicate there are examples.
